}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :DW1540 / DW 1540
'''Dell Wireless 1540 (DW1540)''' :WiFi 802.11a/b/g/n Half-Height Mini-PCI Express Card :Part Number: '''CN-3676J'''-75902-18N-00F7-X07
Compatible with: *Dell Inspiron 11z (1110) *Dell Inspiron 1320 *Dell Inspiron 1370 *Dell Inspiron 1440 *Dell Latitude E6230 *Dell Precision M6700 *Dell Studio Laptop 1450 *Dell Studio Laptop 1457 *Dell Studio Laptop 1458 *Dell Studio Laptop 1555 *Dell Studio Laptop 1557 *Dell Studio Laptop 1558 *Dell Vostro 1440 (3676J) *Dell Vostro 1450 (3676J) *Dell Vostro 1540 (3676J) *Dell Vostro 1550 (3676J)
<small>'''Note''': Compatible with all laptops that have a mini half :PCI-E internal slot, but except IBM & HP Laptops.</small>
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://crunchbang.org/forums/viewtopic.php?id=20879 ''lspci -knn dump'' on '''CrunchBang''' forums] :used in at least some '''Dell Latitude E6430'''s *[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2119824 ''Dell Wireless 1540'' on '''UbuntuForums'''] :used in the '''Dell Latitude E5530'''
